metadata.title: CVE-2017-7837 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: SVG loaded through "" tags can use "" tags within the SVG datato set cookies for that page. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 57. Update Instructions: Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-7837` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions: firefox - 57.0+build4-0ubuntu0.14.04.4 firefox-globalmenu - 57.0+build4-0ubuntu0.14.04.4 firefox-mozsymbols - 57.0+build4-0ubuntu0.14.04.4 firefox-testsuite - 57.0+build4-0ubuntu0.14.04.4 No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '57.0+build4-0ubuntu0.14.04.4').
